reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 79/05: TAX MATTERS - TIME LIMITS FOR 2005 UNDER SECTIONS 308, 308.1, 310, 311, 314 AND 362 OF THE ACT
reg_info.reg_name_text: TAX MATTERS — TIME LIMITS FOR 2005 UNDER SECTIONS 308, 308.1, 310, 311, 314 AND 362 OF THE ACT
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 79/05: TAX MATTERS - TIME LIMITS FOR 2005 UNDER SECTIONS 308, 308.1, 310, 311, 314 AND 362 OF THE ACT
reg_info.act_under: Municipal Act, 2001   Loi de 2001 sur les municipalités

content.content: 1. The time limits for 2005 under subsections 308 (4) and (5), 310 (7), 311 (2) and (4), 314 (1) and 362 (1) of the Act are extended to June 30, 2005. O. Reg. 79/05, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. The time limits for 2005 under subsections 308 (4) and (5), 310 (7), 311 (2) and (4), 314 (1) and 362 (1) of the Act are extended to June 30, 2005. O. Reg. 79/05, s. 1.
